casebody.data:
CAPITOL HILL BUILDING MAINTENANCE, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, and Patriarch, Inc., Plaintiff, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee, and Wilburn Company, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 00-5117. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. June 5, 2001.

Before MICHEL, BRYSON, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
